title: Heart of Obsidian
description:
Step into New York Times bestseller Nalini Singh’s explosive and shockingly passionate Psy-Changeling world . . . 
A dangerous, volatile rebel, hands stained blood-red.A woman whose very existence has been erased.A love story so dark, it may shatter the world itself.A deadly price that must be paid.The day of reckoning is here.From “the alpha author of paranormal romance” comes the most highly anticipated novel of her career—one that blurs the line between madness and genius, between subjugation and liberation, between the living and the dead.
author: Nalini Singh
